Name: ddns-updater
DonateText: This app and docker were generously made by qmcgaw. If you like the project please consider making a donation toward his efforts and check out the MANY other projects he has created on GitHub.

TZ.Name: TZ
TZ.Description: Timezone to have accurate times, i.e. America/Montreal

PUBLICIP_FETCHERS.Name: PUBLICIP_FETCHERS
PUBLICIP_FETCHERS.Description: Comma separated fetcher types to obtain the public IP address from http and dns

PUBLICIP_HTTP_PROVIDERS.Name: PUBLICIP_HTTP_PROVIDERS
PUBLICIP_HTTP_PROVIDERS.Description:
PUBLICIP_HTTP_PROVIDERS gets your public IPv4 or IPv6 address. It can be one or more of the following: (default:all), opendns, ifconfig, ipinfo, ddns, google.

You can also specify an HTTPS URL such as https://ipinfo.io/ip

PUBLICIPV4_HTTP_PROVIDERS.Name: PUBLICIPV4_HTTP_PROVIDERS
PUBLICIPV4_HTTP_PROVIDERS.Description:
PUBLICIPV4_HTTP_PROVIDERS gets your public IPv4 address only. It can be one or more of the following: (default:all), ipify, noip.

You can also specify an HTTPS URL such as https://ipinfo.io/ip

PUBLICIPV6_HTTP_PROVIDERS.Name: PUBLICIPV6_HTTP_PROVIDERS
PUBLICIPV6_HTTP_PROVIDERS.Description:
PUBLICIPV6_HTTP_PROVIDERS gets your public IPv6 address only. It can be one or more of the following: (default:all), ipify, noip.

You can also specify an HTTPS URL such as https://ipinfo.io/ip

PUBLICIP_DNS_PROVIDERS.Name: PUBLICIP_DNS_PROVIDERS
PUBLICIP_DNS_PROVIDERS.Description: PUBLICIP_DNS_PROVIDERS gets your public IPv4 address only or IPv6 address only or one of them. It can be one or more of the following: (default:all), google, cloudflare,

PUBLICIP_DNS_TIMEOUT.Name: PUBLICIP_DNS_TIMEOUT
PUBLICIP_DNS_TIMEOUT.Description: Public IP DNS query timeout (in seconds)

UPDATE_COOLDOWN_PERIOD.Name: UPDATE_COOLDOWN_PERIOD
UPDATE_COOLDOWN_PERIOD.Description: Duration to cooldown between updates for each record. This is useful to avoid being rate limited or banned. (in minutes)

HTTP_TIMEOUT.Name: HTTP_TIMEOUT
HTTP_TIMEOUT.Description: Timeout for all HTTP requests (in seconds)

BACKUP_DIRECTORY.Name: BACKUP_DIRECTORY
BACKUP_DIRECTORY.Description: Directory to read and write data files from internally

BACKUP_PERIOD.Name: BACKUP_PERIOD
BACKUP_PERIOD.Description: Set to a period (i.e. 72h15m) to enable zip backups of data/config.json and data/updates.json in a zip file

LOG_LEVEL.Name: LOG_LEVEL
LOG_LEVEL.Description: Level of logging, debug, info, warning or error

ROOT_URL.Name: ROOT_URL
ROOT_URL.Description: URL path to append to all paths to the webUI (i.e. /ddns for accessing https://example.com/ddns through a proxy)

SHOUTRRR_ADDRESSES.Name: SHOUTRRR_ADDRESSES
SHOUTRRR_ADDRESSES.Description: (optional) Comma separated list of Shoutrrr addresses (notification services) -- (See GitHub Documentation)
